Serialized Form

  • Package doodlepad

    • Class doodlepad.Pad extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • layers

          java.util.List<E> layers
          Layers on the Pad

        • background

          java.awt.Color background
          Background color used to create the Pad on redraw

        • immediateMode

          boolean immediateMode
          If true, all graphical changes trigger a repaint

        • eventsEnabled

          boolean eventsEnabled
          Flag that keeps event enabled state

        • hitHash

          java.util.HashMap<K,V> hitHash
          This HashMap should not leak ShapeMouseListener objects because the HashMap is rebuilt every time the paint() method is called.

        • hitImg

          java.awt.image.BufferedImage hitImg
          In-memory image used to determine target shapes for mouse events.

        • timer

          javax.swing.Timer timer
          Timer event support

        • tickRate

          double tickRate

        • tickListeners

          java.util.List<E> tickListeners
          Lists of custom listeners registered to receive events

        • mouseListeners

          java.util.List<E> mouseListeners

        • keyListeners

          java.util.List<E> keyListeners

        • mouseClickedHandler

          Pad.PadMouseEventHandler mouseClickedHandler
          Private fields that hold event handlers assigned using method references. See for example setMouseClickedHandler()

        • mouseDoubleClickedHandler

          Pad.PadMouseEventHandler mouseDoubleClickedHandler

        • mouseDraggedHandler

          Pad.PadMouseEventHandler mouseDraggedHandler

        • mouseEnteredHandler

        • keyPressedHandler

        • keyReleasedHandler

          doodlepad.Pad.ServerHandler server

        • connectionCount

        • clientConnections

        • cvs

          javax.swing.JPanel cvs
          Inner class extending JPanel and performing core paint operations

        • keyListener

          Inner class to handle key events

        • componentListener

          java.awt.event.ComponentListener componentListener
          Inner class to handle component listener events

        • mouseListener

          java.awt.event.MouseListener mouseListener
          Inner class to handle Pad mouse events
